FuncDef: The display service-security binding command displays binding information about MPAC policies.
CLIs: display service-security binding { ipv4 | ipv6 } [ interface { <interface-type> <interface-number> | <interface-name> } [ slot <slot-id> ] ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID of an interface board. The interface board in this slot must be properly installed.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display service-security binding ipv4 interface GigabitEthernet 1/0/0
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
You can run the display service-security binding command to view binding information about MPAC policies.
